name: Clauncher

evolution.description: Clauncher can evolve into Clawitzer at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Water Gun Pokémon. They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.

abilities.name: Mega Launcher
abilities.description: Aura and Pulse moves made by this Pokémon deal additional damage/healing equal to this Pokémon's proficiency bonus.
